title: KANDW/KANDB/KANDQ/KANDD â€” Bitwise Logical AND Masks

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KANDW k1, k2, k3`
`KANDB k1, k2, k3`
`KANDQ k1, k2, k3`
`KANDD k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise AND between the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
